# harness_platform_infra_provider (Data Source)

Data source for retrieving a Terraform/OpenTofu Provider from the IaCM Provider Registry.

## Example Usage

```terraform
data "harness_platform_infra_provider" "aws" {
  id = "123"
}

output "provider_type" {
  value = data.harness_platform_infra_provider.aws.type
}

output "provider_versions" {
  value = data.harness_platform_infra_provider.aws.versions
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `id` (String) Unique identifier of the provider.

### Read-Only

- `account` (String) Account that owns the provider.
- `created` (Number) Timestamp when the provider was created.
- `description` (String) Description of the provider.
- `type` (String) Provider type (e.g., aws, azurerm, google).
- `updated` (Number) Timestamp when the provider was last updated.
- `versions` (List of Object) List of provider versions. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--versions))

<a id="nestedatt--versions"></a>
### Nested Schema for `versions`

Read-Only:

- `files` (List of String) List of uploaded files for this version.
- `synced` (Boolean) Whether the version is synced.
- `version` (String) Version number.
